class.name: ontology.classes.Crowd
class.description: Represents a set of entities viewed as a compound. A crowd has a a density that evolves during locomotion. A crowd is oriented. It has three sections: front, middle, back. A crowd can be calm or upset. A crowd can victims.

method.name: canVictimsBeEvacuated
method.description: Returns true if wounded elements within this "victims" can be evacuated.

method.name: canVictimsBeExtracted
method.description: Returns true if wounded elements within this "victims" can be extracted.

method.name: extractVictimsFromIt
method.description: To extract wounded victims from this element. This implementation create a new crowd with wounded elements on a near position. New crowd created contains as many elements as there are wounded victims within this crowd.

return.description: Returns true once all wounded victims have been extracted from this element. This implementation returns true once a new crowd of wounded elements have been created.

method.name: canBeLoaded
method.description:
Returns true if this entity can be loaded on agent Unit.
This implementation returns 'true' if 'this' entity is reached (entity is acessible) by agent Unit and if entity is not already loaded (transported).

method.name: canBeUnloaded
method.description:
Returns true if 'this' entity can be unloaded from agent Unit.
This implementation returns 'true' if 'this' entity is loaded (transported) by agent Unit.

method.name: isLoaded
method.description:
Returns 'true' if this entity is 100% loaded in agent Unit.
This implementation returns 'true' if entity is transported by agent Unit.

method.name: loadIt
method.description:
Action of loading this element on agent Unit.
This implementation makes agent Unit "magically" load 'this' entity after a defined delay (in minutes). This action is not dealing with realistic transport of troops. No special physical capabilities is needed to execute this action.

method.name: unloadIt
method.description:
Action of unloading this element from agent Unit.
This implementation makes agent Unit magically unload 'this' entity after a defined delay (in minutes).

return.description:
Returns 'true' on action completion, 'false' otherwise.
This implementation makes agent Unit "magically" unload 'this' entity after a defined delay (in minutes).

method.name: hasConcentration
method.description: Returns 'true' this Crowd has a concentration on the issued position (a crowd may have few concentrations). If no contration of this Crowd exists nearby the given 'Position', this m√©thod returns false.

method.name: healIt
method.description: For agent Unit, to act on this element to heal all wounded persons within it.

method.name: isWounded
method.description: Returns 'true' if this element has wounded persons within.

method.name: canBeHealed
method.description: Returns 'true' if this element can be healed.
